description: Development, Publication, and Advocacy of the 6th Philippine Human Development Report (PHDR): "Institutions, Politics and Human Development in the Philippines"

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Project will undertake activities towards the development, publication and dissemination of the 6th Philippine Human Development Report, with its theme, "Institutions, Politics and Human Development in the Philippines".  The Project aims to generate concrete findings and, thus, create a greater understanding of how human development outcomes are mediated by the interaction between local and national government units and between the three branches of government, how the political environment (rules, norms, beliefs and organization) conditions these interactions, and where and how institutional reforms can be implemented to better enable human development targets.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: 6th Phil Human Development Rep
